comments:
Eclipse Europa version 3.3.0 generates a IOConsoleUpdater error which causes the output to the console to NOT be displayed. It is notable to mention that in the preferances under "Run/Debug->Console" I have the "Limit console output" checkbox UNCHECKED. I am running and debugging JSR-168 compliant portlets that are running in Liferay Portal Professional 4.2.0 (Cowper / Build 3500 / December 11, 2006), which I have all debugging output turned on. I am also running the Apache Tomcat plugin with Tomcat version 5.5.17. The error occurs after 45 min to 1.5 hr of debugging output. I have had the error occur consistently since I stopped limiting the console output in the preferences. An Error console pops up saying that there has been an IOConsoleUpdater error, when I click details all it says is "error". The error continues to pop up on the screen for what I am guessing is every line of output that the console continues to try to display. Below I have attached the Exception and Stacktrace from the .metadata/.log file.
